title: Three important shifts in the world

pages.body: Why you and your clients should be thinking about smarter cloud, and where to start

links.text: Talking to a Chief Procurement Officer

target.title: Business Process as a Service (BPaaS):
target.body: Cloud platform services, where a complete business process is provided as a ser- vice. This can include a wide range of functions across an enterprise, including billing, HR, payroll and advertising.
